message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and see how it goes from here!
You started with 50/50, I'm offering 60/40. Let's see if you can do better!
You offered 60/40, I'll try to counter with 55/45. Can you do better than that?
You countered 60/40 with 55/45, I'm going for 70/30. Can you still do better?
You're pushing hard with 70/30, I'll try to counter with 65/35. Can you meet me in the middle?
You countered 70/30 with 65/35, I'm going for 85/15. This is my best shot, take it or leave it!
You're really pushing hard with 85/15, I'll try to counter with 75/25. Can you meet me at this level?
You countered 85/15 with 75/25, I'm going for 98/2. This is my last stand, take it or leave it!
You're really squeezing me with 98/2, I'll try to counter with 80/20. Can you meet me at this level?
You countered 98/2 with 80/20, I'm sticking to my guns. 98/2 is the best I can do, take it or leave it!
You're really sticking to your guns with 98/2, I'll try to counter with 85/15. Can you meet me at this level?
It's my last chance, I'm going all-in with 98/2. Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
